name: visa_spawn_03

name: visa_rival_04
text: You should not be here, Razor.

name: visa_rival_05
text: Keep out of this realm, Razor.

name: visa_rival_16
text: I will unmake your master's work, Lifestealer.
text_simple: i will unmake your masters work lifestealer

name: visa_rival_17
text: Your death comes at last, Clinkz.
text_simple: your death comes at last clinkz

name: visa_rival_18
text: The cold cannot hide you from me, Lich.
text_simple: the cold cannot hide you from me lich

name: visa_rival_19
text: Go back to hell again. Again!
text_simple: go back to hell again again

name: visa_rival_20
text: Those souls are not your plaything, Fiend.
text_simple: those souls are not your plaything fiend

name: visa_rival_22
text: Even a well-hidden soul can be found.
text_simple: even a wellhidden soul can be found

name: visa_rival_25
text: I shall take you beyond the veil, Death Prophet.
text_simple: i shall take you beyond the veil death prophet

name: visa_rival_26
text: At last you bow before me, Ostarion.
text_simple: at last you bow before me ostarion

name: visa_rival_28
text: These are not your souls to keep.
text_simple: these are not your souls to keep

name: visa_rival_29
text: Behold the world beyond the veil.

text: Invoker. Long has the Underscape desired to meet you.

name: visa_ally_01
text: They will not escape us, Razor.

name: visa_ally_02
text: What are you doing here Lion?!
text_simple: what are you doing here lion

name: visa_respawn_01
text: That which has never lived, cannot die.
text_simple: that which has never lived cannot die

name: visa_respawn_02
text: The hereafter is not for the likes of me.
text_simple: the hereafter is not for the likes of me

name: visa_respawn_07
text: The mortal plane must bear me once more.
text_simple: the mortal plane must bear me once more

name: visa_respawn_08
text: Death has no hold on me.
text_simple: death has no hold on me

name: visa_rare_01
text: I have watched the dead cross over for an eternity. Many have I seen pass below, and beyond: kings and tyrants, peasants and knights, creatures large and small.
text_simple: i have watched the dead cross over for an eternity many have i seen pass below and beyond kings and tyrants peasants and knights creatures large and small

name: visa_rare_02
text: To oppose me is to deny death.
text_simple: to oppose me is to deny death

name: visa_rare_03
text: Once a mortal passes beyond the veil, they may never return.
text_simple: once a mortal passes beyond the veil they may never return

name: visa_rare_04
text: It is one thing to animate a corpse from beneath the ground. It is another to rip a soul from beyond the veil.
text_simple: it is one thing to animate a corpse from beneath the ground it is another to rip a soul from beyond the veil

name: visa_purch_03
text: I do not require gold. Only tools.
text_simple: i do not require gold only tools

name: visa_deny_04
text: It was not yours to take.
text_simple: it was not yours to take

name: visa_drop_medium_01
text: In an eternity of watching, I have seen none like it.
